column2: Unearthed these Waystones are nothing more than ruins covered in moss and tainted by chaos.
As the Waystones are slowly repaired Chaos is drained from the world and offers protection to Albion.
The waystones surge with power and with it the attention of evil beings.
A Waystone Marker helps Druids focus and calibrate the Albion Waystones allowing them to work more effectively.
Using a shard from the Albion Waystones the druids are able to construct a beacon that can feed from Waystones power even at a great distance, though at the loss of some power.
